s.text: Ford has now reissued the Taurus with a higher butt, and Nissan probably can't wait to redo the sad-sack Altima.
The Detroit News recently reported that "in the old days, product plans and designs would go from California to Japan and return watered down, Hirshberg said."
Since Hirshberg's shop produced many of those loser designs, it's odd that he even kept his job, much less wound up as Nissan's public face.
